SEARCH
Package org.blackteasea.revival

Class Data

java.lang.Object
java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport
org.blackteasea.revival.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Data extends PropertyChangeSupport
This class is a singleton that manages data related to the game. It extends PropertyChangeSupport to allow other classes to listen for changes to its properties.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Data getInstance()
      This method returns the singleton instance of the Data class. If the instance is null, it creates a new instance.
      Returns:
      Data object representing the singleton instance

    • getGUIInventory

    • createEntry

      public void createEntry(UUID uuid, org.bukkit.Location loc, boolean revived)
      This method creates a new Storage object for the player and adds it to the playerList.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID object representing the player
      loc - Location object representing the player's location
      revived - boolean representing if the player was revived

    • readEntry

      public Storage readEntry(UUID uuid)
      This method reads the Storage object for the player from the playerList.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID object representing the player
      Returns:
      Storage object representing the player's storage

    • updateEntry

      public void updateEntry(UUID uuid, Storage store)
      This method updates an entry in the playerList.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the player
      store - Storage object representing the player's data

    • deleteEntry

      public void deleteEntry(UUID uuid)
      This method deletes an entry from the playerList.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the player

    • checkEntry

      public boolean checkEntry(UUID uuid)
      This method checks if an entry exists in the playerList.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the player
      Returns:
      boolean representing if the entry exists

    • readAllEntries

      public HashMap<UUID,Storage> readAllEntries()
      This method returns the playerList.
      Returns:
      HashMap of UUIDs to Storage objects

    • load

      public void load()
      This method loads the death list from a YAML file. If an error occurs, it logs the error message.

    • save

      public void save()
      This method saves the death list to a YAML file. If an error occurs, it logs the error message.
